mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(book_id), 0) + 1 AS book_id FROM book_list
SELECT book_id, book_name, book_price, book_des, book_img, book_pages, book_isbn, book_writer, book_regdate, category_code FROM library.book_list;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_list (book_id, book_name, book_price, book_des, book_img, book_pages, book_isbn, book_writer, book_regdate, category_code) VALUES(#{book_id}, #{book_name}, #{book_price}, #{book_des}, #{book_img}, #{book_pages}, "N", #{book_writer}, #{book_regdate}, #{category_code});
